dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 273 : To eliminate the 2013 statutory pay adjustment for Federal employees.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To eliminate the 2013 statutory pay adjustment for Federal employees.

subsection.text: Section 147 of the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2011 (Public Law 111–242; 5 U.S.C. 5303 note), as amended by section 114(a) of the Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2013 (Public Law 112–175; 126 Stat. 1316), is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(1), by striking the matter after ending on and before shall be made and inserting December 31, 2013,; and
in subsection (c), by striking the matter after ending on and before no senior executive and inserting December 31, 2013,.

subsection.text: Section 114(b) of the Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2013 is repealed.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives February 15, 2013.
